entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over southern sections early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over southern sections early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
